channel.title: Hail command dnt work

item.title: Hail command dnt work
item.dc:creator: @_Rune_Realm ~Rune Realm
item.description:
@_Rune_Realm wrote:

Nesting was fucked up (not to mention its overall conventions). Fixed:

if(command.equals("hail") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { //loop so it effects all players if(p != null) { //weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client)p; //specific player's client PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Hahahahaha!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; castOn.setAnimation(858); castOn.txt4="ALL HAIL OWNERS zak AND coca cola"; castOn.string4UpdateRequired = true; } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Hail command dnt work
item.dc:creator: @ak226688 ak226688
item.description:
@ak226688 wrote:

my hail dosent work here it is


if(command.equals("hail") && playerRights >= 3) {
   for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
      if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function
         client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client

         {
         PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Hahahahaha!";
              string4UpdateRequired = true;
         {
         castOn.setAnimation(858);
         castOn.txt4="ALL HAIL OWNERS zak AND coca cola";
         castOn.string4UpdateRequired = true; }
}

wats wrong with it?
